data.eml:eml: A new species of Tangius from north India (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei, Li, Li-Zhen (2013): A new species of Tangius from north India (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae). ZooKeys 346: 23-27, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.346.6233, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.346.6233
